replies.body: HAHAHAHAHAH that's actually great see how Riot responds to this
And some salty %%%% is downvoting all of my posts no matter the content, fucking love the assholes on boards.
I know that feeling.
Hint: they won't.
mate the same thing happened to me today yet i was silver and got matched with a challenger

I already came out as silver 5 for flex queue before this match.

But somehow a bronze 2 and silver 3 = Diamond 1 and Challenger 290 LP.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=gc30Y4pE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-12T12:25:14.880+0000)
>
> I already came out as silver 5 for flex queue before this match.
> 
> But somehow a bronze 2 and silver 3 = Diamond 1 and Challenger 290 LP.

its pre-season placements. its a bit all over the shop.

You can say that again. Played all my placements with a P2 friend, he placed S1. I placed G3 after ending the season in G4 (We went 7/3).

So it's definitely not a hard reset, or we'd have been placed the same or very similar, it seems to be completely random. I guess we just have to keep an eye on Maraudaur's post and see what happens.

My best guess would be they'll either fix the seeding and have everyone redo placements, or they'll match our flex ranks to our solo/duo (or match then soft reset). That's what would make the most sense to me at least.
@seras I ended silver 1 season 5 and i won 7/10 in placement season 6 and somehow got bronze 3 lmao

flex is broken atm , went 8/2 in placements from diamond and got placed in silver.
they need to fix this asap

So in other words, this was a full hard reset.

Fuck you guys riot.

no if it was a hard reset, a fresh account will be placed around g1-4 if u go 8/2(8 win 2 loss)
its just plain broken atm, its pretty ridiculous if u go from being diamond mmr and get placed in silver 2 after going 8/2

A fresh account today got Bronze 2 with 8/2 placements.

I ended this season as Silver 5, and I got Silver 5 again with 5/5 placements.

Flex queue 

Giving higher ranks piss easy games against lower ranks so the low get lower while the high climb higher. 

What a fucking joke.

Also the rengar prolly challenger playing a smurf as he went from silver( prolly a palcement) to d1 in 1 season
I've been thinking this was the reason as well.

hahahah this is so fucked. Did you guys win though?
I had a game against a challenger in it and we somehow still won.
Fuck no, Rengar got fed, i checked the MMR about 12 minutes in and we opened mid.
they set every1s mmr to 0 for flex
Lol get rekt

I don't even know what flex matchmaking is tbh. I would say it feels like a hard reset, although I have friends that are high diamond (solo) getting place low silver, and friends that were high gold (solo) getting placed high plat, so that would't make sense. 

Most of my games have been like yours, horribly mismatched (one game with a literal B5 against one of the top 20 challengers).

Hopefully this is just a trial run for preseason and they let us re-do placements with people in our games closer to our solo rank (don't take my word on this, I'm just _hoping_)
I haven't been paying attention to the ranks of players, but I have noticed a lot of 3 or 5 man premades when I solo or duo.
